revision.text: The '''Safari Zone''' is an area in [[Kanto]] where the player may spend 100 [[Quest Points]] to try and catch unique [[Kanto]] Pokémon. Some Pokémon, like in the original games, only appear in the Safari Zone. The player receives 30 Safari balls. They have an option to either catch, throw a rock, bait the Pokémon, or flee. To unlock this area the Player must first have the [[Safari Ticket]]. Uncaught Pokémon have double the chance of appearing.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
